title: B0001: UI components not rendering on Android 16

timeline.details: Title: B0001: UI components not rendering on Android 16, Severity: high
SDK version mismatch and edge-to-edge display enforcement in Android 16 causing UI components to not render
Updated compileSdk and targetSdk to 35, removed fitsSystemWindows from layouts

hypotheses.reasoning: App targets SDK 34 but running on Android 16 (API 35)

test.test_description: Checked build.gradle.kts - compileSdk and targetSdk are both 34

hypotheses.reasoning: Android 16 enforces edge-to-edge display which may hide UI components

test.test_description: Layout has fitsSystemWindows=true which conflicts with Android 16 edge-to-edge enforcement

hypotheses.reasoning: Category dropdown not populated - possible main thread blocking

test.test_description: ParentModeFragment already uses coroutines for async loading

root_cause.description: SDK version mismatch and edge-to-edge display enforcement in Android 16 causing UI components to not render

resolution.description: Updated compileSdk and targetSdk to 35, removed fitsSystemWindows from layouts

post_mortem.title: B0001: UI components not rendering on Android 16
post_mortem.root_cause: SDK version mismatch and edge-to-edge display enforcement in Android 16 causing UI components to not render
post_mortem.resolution: Updated compileSdk and targetSdk to 35, removed fitsSystemWindows from layouts
lessons_learned: SDK version must match Android API level for compatibility
Edge-to-edge display requires removing fitsSystemWindows in Android 16
action_items: Implement preventive measures for identified root cause
